Certainly will spend some time at Dai Token Ichi but also as a few shops of=
 preference and of course time at the NBTHK. Last year we saw the usual dis=
play and a little later, the display of newly designated Juyo items. With t=
wo blades being submitted this year, wouldn't it be nice to see one of my o=
wn there! Optimist yes, but "never count thy chickens..." 

Ron
STL
